DOC.brief_summary: This is non-interventional study of voriconazole IV formulation in clinical use, which was mandated by the Korean government agency following the approval of Vfend in the Republic of Korea.
DOC.brief_title: Non-Interventional Post Marketing Surveillance Study To Observe The Safety And Efficacy Of VfendÂ® IV
DOC.criteria: Invasive aspergillosis and other serious fungal infections.
